pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Hikvision AX Pro ISAPI IntegrationWrapper for hikvision ax pro alarm kit ISAPI commands.## InstallationUse the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install hikaxpro.```bashpip install hikaxpro```## Usage```pythonfrom hikaxpro import HikAxProaxpro = HikAxPro("{host}", "{username}", "{password}")# returns 'True or False'axpro.arm_away()#returns 'True or False'axpro.disarm()# returns 'True or False'axpro.arm_home()axpro.disarm()```
